scripts.build: pnpm --filter core build && pnpm --filter cli build && pnpm --filter react-dom build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter core lint && pnpm --filter cli lint && pnpm --filter react-dom lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter core test && pnpm --filter cli test && pnpm --filter react-dom test
scripts.types: pnpm --filter core types && pnpm --filter cli types && pnpm --filter react-dom types
scripts.watch: concurrently --names 'core,cli,react-dom' 'pnpm --filter core watch' 'pnpm --filter cli watch' 'pnpm --filter react-dom watch'
